title: BHU Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 07 Program Assistant, Hospital Attendant Posts
description: The Banaras Hindu University (BHU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 07Â Program Assistant, Hospital Attendant, and Sanitary Attendant Jobs.
